java/liquibase/database/template/JdbcOutputTemplate.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 import java.io.Writer;
00005 import liquibase.database.*;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00007 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00008 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00009 
00010 public class JdbcOutputTemplate extends JdbcTemplate {
00011 
00012     private Writer output;
00013 
00014     public JdbcOutputTemplate(Writer output, Database database) {
00015         super(database);
00016         this.output = output;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public boolean executesStatements() {
00020         return false;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public void execute(SqlStatement sql) throws JDBCException {
00024         outputStatement(sql);
00025     }
00026 
00027     public int update(SqlStatement sql) throws JDBCException {
00028         outputStatement(sql);
00029 
00030         return 0;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public void comment(String message) throws JDBCException {
00034         try {
00035             output.write(database.getLineComment());
00036             output.write(" ");
00037             output.write(message);
00038             output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00039         } catch (IOException e) {
00040             throw new JDBCException(e);
00041         }
00042     }
00043 
00044     private void outputStatement(SqlStatement sql) throws JDBCException {
00045         try {
00046             String statement = sql.getSqlStatement(database);
00047             output.write(statement);
00048 
00049             if (!statement.endsWith(";")) {
00050               output.write(";");
00051             }
00052 
00053             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00054                 output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00055                 output.write("GO");
00056             } else if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00057                 output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00058                 output.write("/");
00059             }
00060             output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00061             output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00062         } catch (IOException e) {
00063             throw new JDBCException(e);
00064         }
00065     }
00066 }
